title: Thorpe Park Fright Night tickets are going for nearly half price but be quick
text:

Halloween is fast approaching which means the terrifying Thorpe Park Fright Nights are back - and you can currently bag some seriously cheap tickets.

That's because Wowcher is currently offering up to 49 per cent off tickets with prices from £33pp - and that includes all-day park entry, the rides and the epic scare mazes.

The best part? The deal even includes half term dates if you're looking to treat the older kids to a spooky night out.

Tickets usually cost £55 when bought on the gate, so it can make for quite a budget-friendly trip.

You can already book Wowcher's Thorpe Park Fright Night deal but you'll need to be quick as the offer expires at midnight on Thursday 24th October.

Each voucher entitles one person to entry, but you can buy multiple vouchers as part of the deal.

(Image: Handout)

The Fright Nights have long been a firm favourite with thrill-seekers for Halloween, and this year it promises to offer all the scares and screams you could want.

After all, there are FIVE petrifying mazes to discover including the brand new Creek Freak Massacre attraction, while Fright Nights open up terrifying rides such as Stealth, THE SWARM, SAW The Ride, Colossus and Nemesis Inferno which you can ride at night until 10pm.

(Image: HANDOUT FREE TO USE)

There are three The Walking Dead attractions, as well as other highlights from the Screamplexx Cinema to the new Terror at Amity High show.

It's worth noting that the event isn't recommended for kids aged under 12, but if you are looking for fun days out or spooky Halloween events for younger kids, you might want to check out our guide on cheap days out for October half term .

Looking for more cheap theme park deals?

To give you an extra helping hand we've also put together guides for finding cheap tickets to other UK theme parks such as Drayton Manor , Legoland and Chessington World of Adventures .
description: Thorpe Park Fright Night tickets are currently going for nearly half price including all-day park entry but be quick
